parameters.name: IsHistory
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return historical tasks. Valid values:

- 0: The default value. Returns current tasks.

- 1: Returns historical tasks.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The task type. Valid values:

- rds\_apsaradb\_ha: a primary/secondary node switchover.

- rds\_apsaradb\_transfer: an instance migration.

- rds\_apsaradb\_upgrade: a minor version upgrade.
